Type Property# dashDot

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
static let dashDot: Text.LineStyle.Pattern
```

## [See Also](/documentation/SwiftUI/Text/LineStyle/Pattern/dashDot#see-also)

### [Getting line style patterns](/documentation/SwiftUI/Text/LineStyle/Pattern/dashDot#Getting-line-style-patterns)

[`static let solid: Text.LineStyle.Pattern`](/documentation/swiftui/text/linestyle/pattern/solid)Draw a solid line.[`static let dot: Text.LineStyle.Pattern`](/documentation/swiftui/text/linestyle/pattern/dot)Draw a line of dots.[`static let dash: Text.LineStyle.Pattern`](/documentation/swiftui/text/linestyle/pattern/dash)Draw a line of dashes.[`static let dashDotDot: Text.LineStyle.Pattern`](/documentation/swiftui/text/linestyle/pattern/dashdotdot)Draw a line of alternating dashes and two dots.
